item.title: Faceless Youtube video editor - Upwork
item.description:
Looking for a faceless video editor for content similar to the 2 examples below:

https://youtu.be/Uuk_bmMcZ3U?si=Rms-xirJMjZfCgu9
https://youtu.be/NOJ87P8kIgw?si=cMZaWWHegwFxQm4K

The videos will need to be in the same style as the videos above.

PAY $1/MINUTE + Performance based bonuses
- Videos will be 4 - 20 minutes long (mostly 8/10)
~ Voice over and sometimes clips will be provided together with the script.
- We need 7 videos a week.

We're looking for someone with the following requirements
1. Fast turnaround time 12-24 hours
2. Fast response times
- You significantly increase your chances of getting hired if you send relevant sample's of similar style editing

Budget: $30

item.title: Reels Editor for Personal Brand - Upwork
item.description:
We are seeking a talented and creative reels editor to help us elevate our personal brand on social media. As a reels editor, you will be responsible for creating engaging and eye-catching short video content for platforms such as Instagram and TikTok. The ideal candidate should have a strong understanding of current trends and the ability to tell a compelling story through visual storytelling.
   
   Responsibilities:
   - Edit and enhance raw footage to create high-quality reels
   - Add captivating effects, transitions, and music to make the content visually appealing
   - Collaborate with our team to brainstorm and execute creative concepts
   - Stay up-to-date with social media trends and industry best practices
   
   Requirements:
   - Proficiency in video editing software (e.g., Adobe Premiere Pro, Final Cut Pro)
   - Strong attention to detail and ability to meet deadlines
   - Excellent communication skills and ability to follow creative briefs
   - A portfolio showcasing previous reels editing work
   
$15 per 2-3 reels can pay more depending on experience I want to post 7 days a week 30 days a month!

Budget: $120
Posted On: June 17, 2024 06:11 UTC
Category: Logo Design
Skills:Graphic Design, Video Editing, Adobe Photoshop, Creative Writing, Photo Editing
Skills: Graphic Design, Video Editing, Adobe Photoshop, Creative Writing, Photo Editing
Country: United States
click to apply

item.title: Short Video Content Creator - Upwork
item.description:
We are seeking a creative and tech-savvy Short Video Content Creator to join our team. The ideal candidate will be responsible for producing engaging short videos that provide valuable tips, tricks, and insights about mobile phones and technology. You will work closely with our content and marketing teams to produce videos that resonate with our target audience.

Responsibilities:

- Create engaging and informative short videos ( 1min ) focusing on mobile phone tips, tech hacks, app reviews, and troubleshooting advice. Also cut some podcast interviews with relevant topics and so on.
- Develop a content calendar in collaboration with the content team to ensure a steady flow of video content.
- Write concise, engaging scripts and create storyboards for each video.
- Film and edit videos, incorporating on-screen text, animations, and screen recordings.
- Optimize videos for various platforms, including YouTube Shorts, Instagram Reels
- Monitor video performance and engagement metrics, and make data-driven adjustments to improve future content.
- Stay updated with the latest trends in mobile technology and digital content creation.

check our channel to see the examples:
https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCqHzD10aXkB9T3GIU8_8jhA

and this is our product webpage:
www.toca.site

Hourly Range: $15.00-$40.00
Posted On: June 17, 2024 06:06 UTC
Category: Video Production
Skills:AI-Generated Video, Video Editing, Video Production
Skills: AI-Generated Video, Video Editing, Video Production
Country: Germany
click to apply

item.title: Digital Advertising Creative Designer - Upwork
item.description:
We are looking for a talented designer to help us develop a variety of ad creatives for our digital advertising campaigns on Facebook, Instagram, YouTube, and TikTok. The ideal candidate should have a strong portfolio showcasing their ability to create visually compelling static images and videos that engage our target audience. As a Digital Advertising Creative Designer, you will be responsible for creating eye-catching designs that effectively communicate our brand message and drive conversions.

The ideal candidate will be responsible for creating engaging, eye-catching, on-brand ad creatives for Facebook, Instagram, TikTok, and YouTube that effectively promote our products as well as communicate our brand message and above all, drive conversions.

This role requires a deep understanding of each platform's best practices, creative design, video editing, and a keen eye for detail to produce high-quality, high-converting advertisements.

Responsibilities:
Creative Development: Design and produce high-quality visual and video ad content tailored for Facebook, Instagram, TikTok, and YouTube.
Brand Consistency: Ensure all ad creatives align with VIZR’s brand voice, tone, and visual identity, adhering to our brand guidelines.
Platform Optimization: Develop content optimized for each social media platform, considering their unique formats, audience behaviors, and algorithms.
Campaign Strategy: Collaborate with the marketing team to brainstorm and create compelling ad concepts and campaigns that align with our marketing goals and brand narrative.
Performance Analysis: Work with the marketing team to analyze the performance of ad creatives and continuously improve based on feedback and data.
Project Management: Manage multiple projects simultaneously, ensuring timely delivery of assets.
Requirements:

Experience: Proven experience in creating social media ad creatives, particularly for Facebook, Instagram, TikTok, and YouTube.

Design Skills: Proficiency in graphic design tools such as Canva, Figma, and Adobe Creative Suite (Photoshop, Illustrator, Premiere Pro, After Effects).

Video Production: Strong skills in video production and editing, with a portfolio showcasing high-quality social media ads.

Brand Understanding: Ability to maintain and enhance our brand’s visual identity and message across all ad creatives.

Creative Thinking: Strong creative vision and the ability to translate marketing strategies into compelling visual narratives.

Attention to Detail: High level of attention to detail and commitment to producing high-quality work.

Communication: Excellent verbal and written communication skills.

Adaptability: Ability to quickly adapt to new trends and technologies in social media advertising.

Preferred Qualifications:
Experience working in the wellness, technology, or health industries.
Knowledge of digital marketing strategies and data analysis.
Familiarity with motion graphics and animation.
Experience with user-generated content campaigns and influencer collaborations.

Required Skills:
  - Proficient in graphic design software (Canva, Adobe Photoshop, Illustrator, Premiere Pro etc.)
  - Experience in creating ad creatives for social media platforms
  - Strong understanding of visual storytelling and brand communication
  - Ability to work within brand guidelines and meet strict deadlines

  Size: Medium
  Duration: 1 to 3 months
  Expertise: Intermediate

Budget: $2,000
Posted On: June 17, 2024 06:04 UTC
Category: Graphic Design
Skills:Banner Ad Design, Instagram, Adobe Photoshop, Graphic Design, Digital Design
Skills: Banner Ad Design, Instagram, Adobe Photoshop, Graphic Design, Digital Design
Country: United States
click to apply

item.title: Motion Graphic Artist | Malaysia - Upwork
item.description:
We're a full service video production company working for the biggest clients in the USA and we're seeking to hire a full time animator in Malaysia.

We're very picky when it comes to the skills we look for; our projects are not the classical 'Meet Bob' videos and we'll dismiss all the portfolios with this type of explainers.

We want to meet motion graphics experts that can perform at the highest scene for the biggest brands in the world. You will become part of the most reliable remote team with talents spread all across the globe.

Skills needed:
- motion graphics oriented rather than character animation
(text and logo animations, lower thirds, gradients, shapes etc)
- creating and editing templates
- motion tracking, rotoscoping, basic VFX
- intermediate to advanced proficiency in English
- versatile animation capabilities adaptable to various graphic styles
- advanced proficiency in After Effects and Illustrator
- passion for animation and a keen eye for detail
- ability to seamlessly transition between projects and assist the team as needed
- adaptability to tight deadlines and high-pressure scenarios

Please apply with your best animation portfolio at and make us hire you on spot!


Posted On: June 17, 2024 05:45 UTC
Category: Motion Graphics
Skills:Motion Graphics, Adobe After Effects, Video Editing, Video Production, 2D Animation, Video Commercial, Adobe Illustrator, Animation
Skills: Motion Graphics, Adobe After Effects, Video Editing, Video Production, 2D Animation, Video Commercial, Adobe Illustrator, Animation
Country: Romania
click to apply

item.title: ACTOR/ VIDEO CREATOR WANTED for educational videos - (Photography AI-platform) - Upwork
item.description:
Hey there!

Stockcreator.io helps photographers get into stock photography and sell their images online. We've just launched and would like to start creating video content explaining what stock photography is and how everything works. It will be a mix between educational videos, and tutorials. The videos should be high quality, personal, and with a bit of humor to keep them enticing.

We will offer you topics, scripts, videos, and a media kit to work with. The ideal candidate loves to create, act, and edit videos. It would be great to keep producing content and work with a retainer, preferably about 2 videos monthly. The videos can be short and will be shared on YouTube, Social Media, and our website.

Examples of video topics:

1. What is stock photography?
2. How much money can you make with stock photography?
3. Effects of AI on stock photography explained
4. How big is the stock photography market?
5. What does stockcreator.io do exactly?

Compensation:

Retainer agreement for ongoing video production, let's talk!

Why work with us?

- Strong reputation: Our account has a 4.96 rating on Upwork, and we've spent over €170K on the platform
- Long-term partnership: We value long-term relationships and aim to build them with our team members
- Professional growth: Opportunities to grow and advance in your career

If this sounds exciting and aligns with your experience, we’d love to hear from you!

Please Note: We prefer minimal AI-generated proposals

Thank you for your time, and have a great day!

Cheers,
Cees

Founder, StockCreator.io

Budget: $500
Posted On: June 17, 2024 05:41 UTC
Category: Video Production
Skills:Video Editing, Video Production, Education, Adobe Premiere Pro, Voice-Over, Video Post-Editing, Videography, Graphic Design, Adobe After Effects, Acting, Photography
Skills: Video Editing, Video Production, Education, Adobe Premiere Pro, Voice-Over, Video Post-Editing, Videography, Graphic Design, Adobe After Effects, Acting, Photography
Country: Poland
